discussion.author: pi8027
discussion.comment: I discovered a very clever technique to infer instances of nested join structures without declaring canonical projections in algebraics_fundamentals.v. This method should be documented for someone who need to change this file...

discussion.author: pi8027
discussion.comment: @CohenCyril This one is ready to merge and I have no more things to do on #270 now. CI failure of lemma-overloading seems to be unrelated.

commits.author: pi8027
commits.message:
Small fixes on ssrnum and order

- Give consistency to shape of formulae and namings of lt_def and lt_neqAle like
  lemmas:
  lt_def    x y : (x < y) = (y != x) && (x <= y),
  lt_neqAle x y : (x < y) = (x != y) && (x <= y).
- Provide the ring_display version of le, lt, ge, gt, leif, and comparable
  notations and their explicit variants in Num.Def.
- Implement a new factory for numDomainType to simplify algC.v.
- Reorganize the theory modules in order.v: LTheory, CTheory, TTheory, and
  Theory.
- Rename standard canonical ordered type instances.
- Export Order.*.Exports modules by default.
- Fix cloning notations for ctblatticeType.

commits.author: pi8027
commits.message: Give a unique head symbol for Total.mixin_of, fix the class of the realDomainType, and remove unnecessary packing and cloning notations for realDomainType

commits.author: pi8027
commits.message: Update doc of order and ssrnum

commits.author: pi8027
commits.message: Move [arg min_(i < n | P) F] and [arg max_(i < n | P) F] notations from ssrnum to order

commits.author: pi8027
commits.message:
Fix factories

- Reimplement the real_axiom >-> Order.Total.mixin_of coercion as a factory
- Fix TotalLatticeMixin
